timeline.bodyText:
should we bother to include a classifier for thin jar ? I don't know what the expected file output is !
Anyway the condition in BuildMojo make it attach the jar only for UberJar.
timeline.author: rmanibus

replies.bodyText: If we were going to attach the thin jar we would need to zip it up and attach it as a .zip. I would not bother for now unless we actually have a request for this.
replies.author: stuartwdouglas
